EmailTemplate.name: RE: security support (1343079285.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: security support (1343079285.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Bill, Sounds good – glad you were able to work it out. Take care!Sara From: Bill Cotsworth [mailto:bill@cotsworth.net] Sent: Monday, July 23, 2012 4:54 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: Carol Baxter Subject: RE: security support Sara I am sorry I didn’t get back to you. I kept looking around and was able to find a company in Phoenix that is dedicated to providing hourly support for people needing security such as me. So, thank you for being diligent and trying to help me. I have already set up a different solution. I will keep you in mind for future needs. Bill From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Monday, July 23, 2012 4:17 PM To: Bill Cotsworth Cc: Carol Baxter Subject: RE: security support Hi Bill, Hope you are doing well. I wanted to follow up on your request to speak with our security team to ascertain if they would be able to accommodate your request to act as an “alternate.” Carol Baxter (copied above), is the director of the department and she said she would be happy to speak with you and I via a conference call. Does 10:30am EST tomorrow work for you? If so, I will send out an invite. If not, please suggest another time and I will work on my end to schedule. Thank you!Sara From: Sara Conde Sent: Tuesday, July 17, 2012 5:44 PM To: 'Bill Cotsworth' Subject: RE: security support Hi Bill, It was a pleasure speaking with you. I have passed along your request to our Seurity Team – I will let you know what I hear back. If there is a way we can help, I will find it. In regards to details on our program, you’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhVuWd15OiKNab%2Fiz2OdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> (I know you said you were curious about the services.) We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhVuWd15OiKNab%2Fiz2OdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I will follow up with you as promised, should you have questions before then, please schedule a convenient time using my online schedule. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhVuWd15OiKNab%2Fiz2OdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhVuWd15OiKNab%2Fiz2OdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhVuWd15OiKNab%2Fiz2OdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhVuWd15OiKNab%2Fiz2OdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Bill Cotsworth [mailto:bill@cotsworth.net] <mailto:[mailto:bill@cotsworth.net]> Sent: Tuesday, July 17, 2012 5:09 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: security support Sara I am looking for a way to manage my JPAS account. AEM Services, Inc. has been a TOP SECRET facility for over 20 years. I am the manager of the JPAS account. AEM Services, Inc. is a one person C corporation. DoD requires that I cannot administer my own personal clearance. That must be done by someone else. DoD calls that person the alternate. Recently, JPAS has instituted new procedures requiring special hardware and identification to log into a JPAS account. The alternate that I have been using works for some other company, and does not have the necessary hardware or identification. I am looking for some new person who could be the alternate. I presume I would plan to pay that person by the hour to provide the service. Most security people who have access to JPAS will understand (I hope) what I am talking about. Can MBO provide this service? Or can MBO point me toward some other source for this? Thank you in advance of any information. Bill__________________________ Bill Cotsworth AEM Services, Inc.
1786 Queen Palm Way North Port, FL 34288 (W) (941) 429-5362 (C) (303) 886-2616 Email: cotsworth@aol.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:cotsworth@aol.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhVuWd15OiKNab%2Fiz2OdJ280dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>
